name: Prospect Solutions
tagline: Integrated Marketing B2B Lead Generation agency.
description:
Prospect Solutions is a Vancouver based integrated marketing consulting and professional telemarketing representation company . We develop customized marketing and sales programs to effectively approach, influence, advance, sell and get referrals for our clients since 2003. Our diverse menus of marketing and sales services allow our customers to save time, money and reach their best customers faster.
Our integrated marketing strategy consulting is customized to your current situation, culture and budget. We work together with your team developing professional telemarketing, social media lead generation, business networking,  old leads re-engagement, event  follow up strategies and execute them.
